pkgmetadata.longdescription: # vs-muxtoolsThe extension to muxtools with vapoursynth and encoding stuff## How do I use this?You might wanna check out the [wiki](https://github.com/Irrational-Encoding-Wizardry/vs-muxtools/wiki).## InstallationGit is always the most updated one obviously but I can't guarantee that everything is in a working state.You can also grab the latest stable ish versions from pip.[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/vsmuxtools.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/vsmuxtools)
